Note

Archon depends on web3 1.0. This version of web3 is still in Beta so usage is subject to change unexpectedly with updates to the underlying library. _.

archon.js - Ethereum Arbitration Standard APIÂ¶

archon.js is a web3.js <https://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/1.0/index.html> backed api that provides functionality for interacting with smart contracts that follow the Arbitration Standard ERC 792 <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/792> and the related Evidence Standard ERC TBD.
